name: cell to node
desc: The cell to node module is used to interpolate cell data components to nodal data components.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Separate Cells
properties.desc: The Separate Cells toggle will force any cells with shared nodes to separate preventing any blurring of values between cells.

properties.name: Cell Data Components
properties.desc: The Cell Data Components control allows the user to select which cell data to interpolate.

properties.name: Output Cell Data
properties.desc: The Output Cell Data option allows the user to specify how to handle input cell data in the output.

properties.name: Strip Original Data
properties.desc: This has been deprecated - use Output Nodal Data instead
